name: Societ Broth with Bulghur Wheat

recipeInstructions.text: Boil lamb shank in chicken broth until tender. Remove meat and bones.
Cut meat into small pieces and return to broth.
Add all vegetables and herbs. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add bulghur wheat. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Slowly stir in 8 cups of soup mixture, then add remaining soup.
Continue cooking until thickened, about 3 minutes.

keywords: lamb soup, bulghur broth, Middle Eastern soup
